resources.string: Memoir application creates a short movie with two second video clips shot each day of your life. You can then view the movie to recall some of best moments of your life!

Memoir application creates a short movie with video clips shot each day of your life. You can either manually click a video of a memorable event in the day or the application can do it for you. You can then view the movie to recall some of your best moments summarized in a few minutes!
1. Go to Settings. \n2. Select “Set Start Date” or “Set End Date”. \n3. Your movie is updated to show videos within selected dates.

1. Click Camera icon. 
2. Hold the camera in Landscape mode and press record button. 
3. The camera automatically stops recording after selected seconds. 
4. You can select or cancel the current video. 
5.On selecting, the video is added to list of videos.

1. Selected video for the day is highlighted in blue in the list of videos. By default, the last video taken for the day is selected. \n2. Touch and hold video for options Select/Delete. \n3. If a selected video is deleted, the first video of the day is marked selected.
1. Click on Share icon to view list of available sharing options. \n2. Your movie is exported as MyLife.mp4.

1. Select Import Video option from menu. 
2.Choose video from gallery. 
3.Only landscape videos in .mp4 format shot with highest camera resolution can be imported. 
4.Video edit screen is displayed for the selected video. 
5.Move the blue marker over the video strip at the bottom to choose specific portion of the video. 
6.Play button will play the selected portion. 
7.You can now select or cancel the clip to import in list of videos. 
8.The video will be added to list on the date when the original video was taken.

1. Take videos each day by clicking on Camera icon. The videos are displayed in a list for each date. 
2. You can take multiple videos in a day but only one video per day is selected for your movie. 
3. Press and hold the video thumbnail to select/delete from videos for a day. 
4. You can view the complete movie by clicking the play button above list of videos. 
5. Each time a video is taken/selected/deleted or start/end dates are changed, the movie is updated with the new selections. 
6. Share your movie by clicking the “(share image)” button.
